title: Hour 2: The Real MVP?
description:
In this episode, Stephen A., Jeff Saturday, and Paul Finebaum make predictions for the College Football Playoff after Week 1 wraps up, including how far Clemson can go this season. Plus, it's time for Stephen's A-List as he ranks the top 5 NFL teams going into the season. Stephen A. and Saturday get into it in the debate over this year's MVP candidates. The crew tells us which team they believe will be the biggest disappointment this season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Who will win the NFL MVP race?
